narrative.narrative: Petra Airlines is based at Amman,Jordan. It was founded in 2005 but didn't get its first plane until 2010. That plane would be the A320, still the only plane it has as of 2014. It's destinations include 2 in Egypt, 2 in Saudi Arabia and 3 in Turkey. It has a secondary hub at Marka,Jordan near Amman and at Aqaba they have a focus city.
